CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Proposal Sent stage positioned above or below the Client Onboarded stage?
SRP.A: The Proposal Sent stage is positioned {above} the Client Onboarded stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Proposal Sent?
VE.A: The value of stage Proposal Sent is {708}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Needs Analysis?
VE.A: The value of stage Needs Analysis is {893}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initial Contact?
VE.A: The value of stage Initial Contact is {1048}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Contact, with a value of {1048}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Client Onboarded, with a value of {219}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Needs Analysis to stage Proposal Sent?
SC.A: Decreased by {185} Clients from stage Needs Analysis to stage Proposal Sent.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Proposal Sent to stage Negotiation?
SC.A: Decreased by {176} Clients from stage Proposal Sent to stage Negotiation.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 620? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initial Contact} stage has {1048}, the {Needs Analysis} stage has {893}, the {Proposal Sent} stage has {708}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 620? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Negotiation} stage has {532}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {371}, the {Client Onboarded} stage has {219}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 451 and 620? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Contract Signed to Client Onboarded, or from stage Initial Contact to Needs Analysis?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Contact} to {Needs Analysis} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Contract Signed to Client Onboarded, or from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Needs Analysis} to {Proposal Sent} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Proposal Sent to Negotiation, from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, or from stage Initial Contact to Needs Analysis?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Proposal Sent} to stage {Negotiation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Needs Analysis} and {Proposal Sent} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Contract Signed} and {Client Onboarded} stages.
